title: Honorific for Lucius Iulius Agrippa, euergetes

editionAuthor.title: Inscriptiones Segestanae. Le iscrizioni greche e latine di Segesta
editionAuthor.citation: Carmine Ampolo e Donatella Erdas, Inscriptiones Segestanae. Le iscrizioni greche e latine di Segesta (Pisa: Edizioni della Normale, 2019)

support: A large plaque of limestone made up of three connecting fragments. Intact on all sides.

layout.p: Four lines centred on the upper half of the plaque.

handNote.lettering: Slightly irregular letters iwth a broad square module, but narrower towards the end of each line. E has upward curling serifs; triangular interpuncts; final A of line 3 is small, at 29mm.

date._: Suggested to be Tiberian or Claudian on palaeographic and onomastic grounds

provenanceFound._: Found in May 1992, in the fill of the base of the temple on the west side of the agora, in a mediaeval layer

location.address: Case Barbaro - contrada Barbaro S.R. 22, 91013 Calatafimi
